TimeML.IN: TENDER OFFERS, MERGERS, ACQUISITIONS (TNM) MEDICAL AND BIOTECHNOLOGY (MTC)
TimeML.TEXT:
Advanced Medical Technologies Inc. said it purchased 93% of a unit of Henley Group Inc.
Advanced Medical paid $106 million in cash for its share in a unit of Henley's Fisher Scientific subsidiary. The unit makes intravenous pumps used by hospitals and had more than $110 million in sales last year, according to Advanced Medical.
